Maxmillian Levec Kunitz (born June 27, 1970), known as Sicx aka Triple Sicx Bounty is an American underground MC and convicted child molester from Sacramento, California. Sicx is currently incarcerated following convictions of sex offenses against childrenÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Âª
 
Sicx began rapping in 1987 under the name Strobe-Lite. He was a member of the ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â£Street Talk CrewÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â¥ along with his brother Brotha Lynch Hung. Sicx has released two solo albums, Dead 4 Life (1995) and If These Walls Could Talk (1998). He collaborated with Brotha Lynch Hung on the album Nigga Deep, which was released in 1992 and re-released in 1998.
 
Kunitz and his girlfriend, Aniva Jamieson, were arrested and charged on 69 felony counts of child molestation, possession of child pornography and several other sex offense charges. Kunitz and Jamieson faced a combined 400 years in prison.
 
In September 2004, they pleaded guilty of four counts of committing a lewd or lascivious act upon a child and they both were sentenced to 32-year prison terms.


All songs from various Sicx Albums; Dead 4 Life, KRD-Sac Town Funk, Rush-N-Roulette Vol.2, Ill Matik Vol.1 The Illegitimati, Bad To Da Bone, Head Drama, Pimpin' & Panderin' & Deer Hunter. I converted them into 128kbps mp3's with youtube downloader.
